column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A violent incident broke out at “Shiny Food & Pub”
column8: on 3 June 2020.------The victim was Tith Pheakroth
column11: the victim and 5 friends came and sat down to drink in Shiny on Street 172
column13: who were sitting next to each other
column14: smashed a glass over the victim’s head
column15: and escaped. The victim was taken to a hospital and received 10 stitches.------After being treated
column16: the victim came to file a complaint to the police at Phsar Thmei 3 police station to help find the perpetrators. ------AREY
